title: Corona
data:
{{version030}} ''For the mechanic sometimes referred to as "glow", see [[magic contamination]].'' {{flavour|Causes a halo of glowing light to surround and effectively outline a creature. This glow offsets the dark, musty atmosphere of the dungeon, and makes the affected creature appreciably easier to hit.}} '''Corona''' (also known as "'''glowing'''" or "'''backlit'''") is a [[status effect]] and monster-only spell which causes the target to glow with an aura of light. ==Effect== The Corona status prevents you from going [[invisible]], greatly reduces your [[stealth]], and makes you easier to hit (attackers gain a [[to-hit]] bonus of 1d8 + 1). Monsters inflicted by Corona are affected in a similar fashion, though monsters don't have any stealth to reduce. This status is negated by being in [[Dithmenos]]' [[Shadow Form]]. ==Sources== Other than the Corona spell, the following sources can inflict the Corona status: *Evoking a [[piece from Xom's chessboard]] has a 10% chance to inflict Corona on monsters. *[[Ru]]'s Aura of Power may inflict the Corona status on monsters. *[[Zin]]'s Recite may inflict Corona on monsters. *[[Meteorae]] have an innate [[Glowing (mutation)|glowing mutation]]. The following don't inflict the Corona status directly, but causes the same effect: *[[Magic contamination]] above 5000 (yellow or higher) causes glowing, among other unpleasant effects. *Setting a target ablaze with [[Sticky Flame]] also causes them to glow. *A [[halo]] will backlight all creatures within it. When you emit a halo, the accuracy bonus does ''not'' apply against you - you aren't any easier to hit. ==Monster Spell== The Corona spell must have line of fire to the target to cast, and it must overcome the target's [[willpower]] to inflict the status. {{monsters with spell}} ==History== {{spell |name=Corona |level=1 |school1={{Hexes}} |school2= |school3= |sources=
*[[Book of Maledictions]] *[[Book of Debilitation]]
|castingnoise=1 |spellnoise=0 }} *Prior to [[0.28]], Corona was a player-castable level 1 Hexes spell. [[Enchanter]]s and [[Arcane Marksmen]] started with Corona memorized. *Prior to [[0.13]], a target affected by Corona could cancel this effect by going [[invisible]]. *In [[0.10]] Corona received a power boost (+50% to spellpower).
